# HegemonikÃ³n

> AI-Native Cognitive Architecture based on the Free Energy Principle.

## Core Documentation (Read in Order)
1. [AGENTS.md](AGENTS.md): **READ FIRST**. Developer guidelines, boundaries, and commands.
2. [docs/STRUCTURE.md](docs/STRUCTURE.md): Detailed architecture (English, AI-optimized).
3. [docs/ARCHITECTURE.md](docs/ARCHITECTURE.md): Theoretical foundations (FEP, 4-axis model).
4. [.ai/guidelines.md](.ai/guidelines.md): Coding standards and conventions.
5. [STRUCTURE.md](STRUCTURE.md): Structure overview (Japanese, Human-readable).
6. [README.md](README.md): General project overview.

## Key Architectures
- [kernel/](kernel/): Theoretical foundations (FEP, Active Inference). **DO NOT MODIFY**.
- [.agent/workflows/](.agent/workflows/): Standard procedures (Boot, Plan, Code).
- [.agent/skills/](.agent/skills/): Cognitive modules (M1-M8, P1-P4).

## Tools
- [forge/gnosis/](forge/gnosis/): Knowledge Base & RAG system.
- [forge/scripts/](forge/scripts/): Utility scripts.

## Data
- [vault/](vault/): Long-term memory (Markdown).
- [gnosis_data/](gnosis_data/): Vector database (LanceDB).
